Smart-contract to manage Options pool, collatral pool, mine pool, FPTCoin, etc.  ","methods":{"addCollateral(address,uint256)":{"details":"Deposit collateral in this pool from user.","params":{"amount":"the amount of collateral to deposit.","collateral":"The collateral coin address which is in whitelist."}},"addNetBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"The foundation operator want to add some coin to netbalance, which can increase the FPTCoin net worth.","params":{"amount":"the amount of the settlement coin which the foundation operator want to transfer in this contract address.","settlement":"the settlement coin address which the foundation operator want to transfer in this contract address."}},"addOperator(address)":{"details":"add a new operator by owner.       "},"addWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.","params":{"addAddress":"new eligible address."}},"buyOption(address,uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"user buy option and create new option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of new option user want to buy.","expiration":"user input expiration,time limit from now","optType":"user input option type","settlement":"user's settement coin address","settlementAmount":"amount of settlement user want fo pay.","strikePrice":"user input option's strike price","underlying":"user input option's underlying id, 1 for BTC,2 for ETH"}},"calCollateralWorth(address)":{"details":"Retrieve user's collateral worth in all collateral coin.  If user want to redeem all his collateral,and the vacant collateral is sufficient, He can redeem each collateral amount in return list.","params":{"account":"the retrieve user's account;"}},"calOptionsOccupied(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"The auxiliary function for calculate option occupied. ","params":{"amount":"option's amount","optType":"option's type, 0 for call, 1 for put.","strikePrice":"option's strike price","underlyingPrice":"option's underlying price"}},"calSharedPayment()":{"details":"Calculate the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently"},"calculateCollateralRate()":{"details":"collateral occupation rate calculation     collateral occupation rate = sum(collateral Rate * collateral balance) / sum(collateral balance)"},"constructor":{"details":"Options manager constructor. set other contract address","params":{"FPTCoinAddr":"FPTCoin contract address","optionsPoolAddr":"optoins pool contract address","optionsPriceAddr":"options price contract address","oracleAddr":"fnx oracle contract address."}},"exerciseOption(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"User exercise option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of option user want to exercise.","optionsId":"option's ID which was wanted to exercise, must owned by user"}},"getAvailableCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the available collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for buy options, priced in USD. "},"getCollateralRate(address)":{"details":"Get the minimum collateral occupation rate."},"getInputAmountRange()":{"details":"get the valid range of input amount"},"getLeftCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the left collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for redeem collateral, priced in USD. "},"getOccupiedCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the occupied collateral worth, multiplied by minimum collateral rate, priced in USD. "},"getOperator()":{"details":"get all operators.       "},"getPriceRateRange()":{"details":"retrieve input price valid range rate, thousandths."},"getRealBalance(address)":{"details":"Retrieve the balance of collateral, the auxiliary function for the total collateral calculation. "},"getTokenNetworth()":{"details":"Retrieve FPTCoin's net worth, priced in USD."},"getTotalCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the total collateral worth, priced in USD. "},"getUnlockedCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the unlocked collateral worth, the worth of collateral which currently used for options, priced in USD. "},"getUserPayingUsd(address)":{"details":"Retrieve user's cost of collateral, priced in USD.","params":{"user":"input retrieved account "}},"getUserTotalWorth(address)":{"details":"Retrieve user's current total worth, priced in USD.","params":{"account":"input retrieve account"}},"getWhiteList()":{"details":"Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist."},"isEligibleAddress(address)":{"details":"Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.","params":{"tmpAddress":"input address for testing."}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"redeemCollateral(uint256,address)":{"details":"redeem collateral from this pool, user can input the prioritized collateral,he will get this coin, if this coin is unsufficient, he will get others collateral which in whitelist.","params":{"collateral":"The prioritized collateral coin address.","tokenAmount":"the amount of FPTCoin want to redeem."}},"removeOperator(address)":{"details":"remove operator by owner.       "},"removeWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.","params":{"removeAddress":"revoked address."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"sellOption(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"User sell option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of option user want to sell.","optionsId":"option's ID which was wanted to sell, must owned by user"}},"setCollateralRate(address,uint256)":{"details":"The foundation owner want to set the minimum collateral occupation rate.","params":{"colRate":"The thousandths of the minimum collateral occupation rate.","collateral":"collateral coin address"}},"setInputAmountRange(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"set the valid range of input amount","params":{"_maxAmount":"the maximum input amount limit","_minAmount":"the minimum input amount limit"}},"setOperator(address[])":{"details":"set all operators by owner.       "},"setOperator(uint256,address)":{"details":"modify indexed operator by owner.       "},"setPriceRateRange(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"set input price valid range rate, thousandths."},"setSharedPayment(int256[],int256[],uint256)":{"details":"Set the calculation results of the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently","params":{"firstOption":"The new first unexpired option's index.","newNetworth":"Current expired options' net worth ","sharedBalances":"All unexpired options' shared balance distributed by time."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"userInputCollateral(address,address)":{"details":"Retrieve user's amount of the specified collateral.","params":{"collateral":"input retrieved collateral coin address ","user":"input retrieved account "}}},"title":"Options manager contract for finnexus proposal v2."},"userdoc":{"methods":{"setHalt(bool)":{"notice":"function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or devdoc.details: A Smart-contract to manage Options pool, collatral pool, mine pool, FPTCoin, etc.

addCollateral(address,uint256).details: Deposit collateral in this pool from user.

params.amount: the amount of collateral to deposit.
params.collateral: The collateral coin address which is in whitelist.

addNetBalance(address,uint256).details: The foundation operator want to add some coin to netbalance, which can increase the FPTCoin net worth.

params.amount: the amount of the settlement coin which the foundation operator want to transfer in this contract address.
params.settlement: the settlement coin address which the foundation operator want to transfer in this contract address.

addOperator(address).details: add a new operator by owner.

addWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.

buyOption(address,uint256,uint256,uint32.details: user buy option and create new option.

params.amount: user input amount of new option user want to buy.
params.expiration: user input expiration,time limit from now
params.settlementAmount: amount of settlement user want fo pay.
params.underlying: user input option's underlying id, 1 for BTC,2 for ETH

calCollateralWorth(address).details: Retrieve user's collateral worth in all collateral coin.  If user want to redeem all his collateral,and the vacant collateral is sufficient, He can redeem each collateral amount in return list.

calOptionsOccupied(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: The auxiliary function for calculate option occupied.

params.optType: option's type, 0 for call, 1 for put.

calSharedPayment().details: Calculate the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently

calculateCollateralRate().details: collateral occupation rate calculation     collateral occupation rate = sum(collateral Rate * collateral balance) / sum(collateral balance)

constructor.details: Options manager constructor. set other contract address

params.amount: user input amount of option user want to exercise.
params.optionsId: option's ID which was wanted to exercise, must owned by user

getAvailableCollateral().details: Retrieve the available collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for buy options, priced in USD.

getCollateralRate(address).details: Get the minimum collateral occupation rate.

getInputAmountRange().details: get the valid range of input amount

getLeftCollateral().details: Retrieve the left collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for redeem collateral, priced in USD.

getOccupiedCollateral().details: Retrieve the occupied collateral worth, multiplied by minimum collateral rate, priced in USD.

getPriceRateRange().details: retrieve input price valid range rate, thousandths.

getRealBalance(address).details: Retrieve the balance of collateral, the auxiliary function for the total collateral calculation.

getTokenNetworth().details: Retrieve FPTCoin's net worth, priced in USD.

getTotalCollateral().details: Retrieve the total collateral worth, priced in USD.

getUnlockedCollateral().details: Retrieve the unlocked collateral worth, the worth of collateral which currently used for options, priced in USD.

getUserPayingUsd(address).details: Retrieve user's cost of collateral, priced in USD.

getUserTotalWorth(address).details: Retrieve user's current total worth, priced in USD.

getWhiteList().details: Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist.

isEligibleAddress(address).details: Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemCollateral(uint256,address).details: redeem collateral from this pool, user can input the prioritized collateral,he will get this coin, if this coin is unsufficient, he will get others collateral which in whitelist.

params.tokenAmount: the amount of FPTCoin want to redeem.

removeWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: user input amount of option user want to sell.
params.optionsId: option's ID which was wanted to sell, must owned by user

setCollateralRate(address,uint256).details: The foundation owner want to set the minimum collateral occupation rate.

params.colRate: The thousandths of the minimum collateral occupation rate.

setInputAmountRange(uint256,uint256).details: set the valid range of input amount

setPriceRateRange(uint256,uint256).details: set input price valid range rate, thousandths.

setSharedPayment(int256[],int256[],uint2.details: Set the calculation results of the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently

params.firstOption: The new first unexpired option's index.
params.sharedBalances: All unexpired options' shared balance distributed by time.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userInputCollateral(address,address).details: Retrieve user's amount of the specified collateral.

devdoc.title: Options manager contract for finnexus proposal v2.

setHalt(bool).notice: function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or not.
